article_title: PE Sees Home Care and Hospice As ‘Well Positioned’ in Obamacare
article_text:
Against the backdrop of sweeping healthcare reforms due to take effect as part of the Affordable Care Act, private equity investors are betting that Americans want to turn away from traditional nursing home and in-patient care services.

Home care or community-based healthcare is driving a substantial portion of the recent private equity investment into healthcare services, according to Clearview Capital co-founder and managing partner James G. Andersen.
